title: Ranked disabled?
body: I only have the option for Blind and Draft. Is ranked disabled for a reason? or glitch?

replies.body: It's a method of loss prevention! Since we're currently having issues with our login servers, if someone was to get disconnected right now during a ranked match they would not be able to log back in. We don't want this to happen, so ranked play will be disabled while we work on the login servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IUREb13P,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-14T23:31:31.298+0000)
>
> It's a method of loss prevention! Since we're currently having issues with our login servers, if someone was to get disconnected right now during a ranked match they would not be able to log back in. We don't want this to happen, so ranked play will be disabled while we work on the login servers.

Thank you for the reply! I hope all is fixed!
